Value: RedFlow Limited develops, manufactures, and sells zinc-bromine flowing electrolyte batteries worldwide. The company offers ZBM2, an energy storage system with 10 kilowatt-hours (kWh) capacity; and ZCell, an 10kWh energy storage system for homes and offices. It also provides Large Scale Battery reference platform for deploying ZBM2 zinc-bromine flow batteries in large energy storage systems; and battery management systems. The company's batteries are used in telecommunications, agriculture, commercial and industrial, grid-scale, and residential applications. RedFlow Limited was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Brisbane, Australia.
